column1: Smoque BBQ////We ordered our food at the counter and even though the place was jam packed
column2: they sat us right away. A few minutes later we had our food. Even though the atmosphere is hectic (and there were other customers lingering around our table)
column3: someone came by to ask us if we needed anything else
column5: and then to clear the plates. I really have no complaints. Well
column7: it was a little drafty but I was totally fine.
